summary: Elisabeth and Grudren are two Swedish divorcées, both over 40, who meet when Elisabeth parks her car on a loading zone and is ticketed by Gudrun. Depspite this shaky start, a friendship ... See full summary »
cast: Helena Bergström|Maria Lundqvist|Claes Månsson|Johan Rabaeus|Jill Johnson|Erica Braun|Marie Robertson|Christoffer Svensson|Niki Gunke Stangertz|Jan Waldekranz|Vas Blackwood|Sam Smart|Magnus Byström|Andreas Grant|Jean-Luc Julien|Joe Maples
title: Heartbreak Hotel
